Scripts.OnEnter:
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Notify all guild members in the raid
 of their actual Net DKP amounts,
 along with the gained/spents stats
 of the last session");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Gives to all guild members in raid\n the amount of DKP specified.");

Scripts.OnMouseWheel: if arg1==1 then QDKP2_frame1_dkpPerHourSet("+") else QDKP2_frame1_dkpPerHourSet("-") end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Starts/Stop the raid timer that will\n give the specified amount of DKP\n every hour.");

GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Starts/Ends the ironman bonus, wich
 gives the Raid Award to the guild
 members who stays in the raid from the
 start to the end.");

GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("If this is checked and the timer is on,
 when a mob wich name is in the table
 in QDKP option file dies, the
 raid get the specified amount
 of DKP");

GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("If this is checked, when someone say
 in raid or raid warning a phrase like
 'xyz won with 54' or similar, a dialog
 will ask if you want to charge him
 for that amount to pay the last object
 seen in chat.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Upload all the changes done to the Officer/Public notes");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Starts a new session, resetting\n all counters and erasing all unsent\n changes.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Backup all the officernotes in a local file");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Restores the data from a previous backup");

Frame.name: QDKP2_Frame2
Frame.Frames:
QDKP2_ToggleAfter(2);
getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText("Show All Guild");
QDKP2_AllGuildCheckButtonSet("toggle");
QDKP2_frame2_sort_by_name()
QDKP2_frame2_sort_by_rank()
QDKP2_frame2_sort_by_class()
QDKP2_OpenLog
QDKP2_frame2_sort_by_ep()
QDKP2_frame2_sort_by_gp()
QDKP2_frame2_sort_by_priority()
QDKP2_frame2_sort_by_hours()
this:RegisterForClicks("LeftButtonDown", "RightButtonDown")
if arg1=="LeftButton" then QDKP2_Frame2_OnClick() else QDKP2_OpenLog() end

QDKP2_ScrollList("-")
QDKP2_ScrollList("+")
GuildRoster() QDKP2_DownloadGuild(nil,false) QDKP2_UpdateRaid() QDKP2_RefreshAll()
QDKP2_AddExternal()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Adds an external (not in guild) player to the Guild Roster.\nPlease read the mod's manual before using this feature.");
GameTooltip:Hide();
QDKP2_RemExternal()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Removes the selected External. Beware, ther is no UnDo!");
GameTooltip:Hide();
QDKP2_PostExternals("GUILD")
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Post External's DKP amounts to the Guild Chat.");
GameTooltip:Hide();
QDKP2_AddRaid(QDKP2_SelectedPlayer) QDKP2_RefreshAll()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Adds the selected Guld member to the Raid roster,\njust as he would be in the Raid. He will take the\nsame awards as a normal Raid member.");
GameTooltip:Hide();
QDKP2_RemRaid(QDKP2_SelectedPlayer) QDKP2_RefreshAll()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Removes the selected Standby player from the Raid Roster.");
GameTooltip:Hide();
QDKP2_SetClearAlt()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Sets the selected member as an alt.\nYou'll have to define the Main character.");
GameTooltip:Hide();

Scripts.OnTextChanged: if QDKP2_CancelFirstOnChange then QDKP2_CancelFirstOnChange=false else QDKP2_LootToPay = nil end

Scripts.OnMouseWheel: if arg1==1 then QDKP2_ScrollList_Log(- arg1*QDKP2_LOG_SCROLL_WHEEL) else QDKP2_ScrollList_Log(- arg1*QDKP2_LOG_SCROLL_WHEEL) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Include and Exlude the selected player\nfrom the list of players elegible for the award.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Opens the main entry where\nthis one is linked to.");
